column2: "Oh, <%me>. That broadcast was amazing. Such a loud voice, it took me by surprise."
"Is he one of the Council of Six? They're the greatest of all the ARKS."
"He didn't seem like such a colorful person, huh. Uh, well, I hope he's strong."
"He was talking about some sort of festival, wasn't he."
"アイドルさんの話も聞くしなんだか活気がある感じ。"
"わたしも活気に乗っかって 騒いでみたいなあ... なんて."
"Oh, uh, why don't I? Philia told me not to overexert myself because of my terrible headache."
"<%me>, you're taking part, right? I'll have fun watching from the sidelines."
"So, <%me>, for my part, I'll wish you good luck."
